mods.abstract: Students at mosque of el-Azhar. A group of Egyptian male students sitting and standing within the colonnade of the mosque and university of el-Azhar; "Zangaki No. 1618 Interieur Mosquee El Azhar" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
